content:
GraphicsState Class

Definition

Represents the state of a Graphics object. This object is returned by a call to the stem.Drawing.Graphics.Save* methods. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public sealed class GraphicsState : MarshalByRefObject

System.MarshalByRefObject
